bibl.title: The Landscape and Language of Korinna.
bibl.note: Korinna and the landscape of Boiotia [in B.K.T. V, 2, xiv, 284 (= M.-P.3 251; LDAB 571)]. - Language and landscape. - A portrait and a note on time and space: Korinna's verse fits very nicely at Tanagra and around 335-320 B.C.
bibl.seg: BERMAN Daniel W., The Landscape and Language of Korinna.

Korinna and the landscape of Boiotia [in B.K.T. V, 2, xiv, 284 (= M.-P.3 251; LDAB 571)]. - Language and landscape. - A portrait and a note on time and space: Korinna's verse fits very nicely at Tanagra and around 335-320 B.C.
